title: (2) ElectroVoice QRX112-75 Professional High Powered Speakers with Road Case. (1 with bad high freq)
item_description:
(2) ElectroVoice QRX112-75 Professional High Powered Speakers with Road Case. (1 with bad high freq)

  • Quantity:2 ElectroVoice QRX112/75
  • Professional high powered 12in two-way speaker with 3in compression driver.
  • Rotateable horn
  • Passive or biamp mode switch
  • Monitor angle
  • Custom road case
  • (1 Speaker has a bad high freq driver. Diaphram needs to be replaced)
